history.content:
The Berkeley Math Tournament (BMT) is the largest student-run math competition in the Bay Area and is internationally renowned, holding both BMT (with 2000+ high school contestants) and BmMT (with 2000+ middle school contestants) annually. If you have an interest in STEM or education, and would like to help us in our goal to create an enjoyable contest experience for our students, we would love to have you join our team, no matter how much experience you might have with math competitions!

We are currently hiring for the following roles:
- Problem-writers & Test-solvers
- BMT China Coordinators
- BmMT China Translators
- Diversity/Inclusion interns
- Activities/Mini-Competition interns
- WebMaster/Historian
- Tech interns

If you are interested in joining, please join our Discord Server at tinyurl.com/bmtdiscord, where all recruitment information will be posted. For more information about BMT, feel free to look through our website (bmt.berkeley.edu) or send us an email at questions@bmt.berkeley.edu. 

We hope to see you soon!
BMT
history.subject: Join Berkeley Math Tournament!
